Mr. Speaker. I am pleased to join the members of the Merchant Marine Committee in expressing strong support for the bill establishing the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program.  The Junior Duck Stamp Program is modeled after the Federal Duck Stamp Program established in the Great Lakes Program of the Natural Resources Conservation Service. The Junior Duck Stamp Program allows competition for designs that showcase ducks from a variety of sources, all of which are artful and recognizable.  Junior Duck Stamp Design Competition seeks to promote the importance of conservation among ducks. By holding such competitions, the Junior Duck Stamp Program helps promote Rudy's duck identification and reminds the public that ducks can be a valuable part of our natural heritage. Keywords: 
states america fires 

Final sequence: 

Madam President, in 1994 I led the fight for tax relief for America's working families. The American Recovery and Reinvestment Act was the first major legislation in a generation to provide tax relief to middle class Americans and small businesses in States across the country that were hit hard by the worst economic crisis since the Great Depression. In those tough times, no one could have foreseen fires, shortages, slowdowns, unemployment rates, and bankruptcies, but thanks to hard work and determination, we have recovered and turned the economy around.
